topics.body:
Brief panic attack:
Had my hair sticking upwards and saw a bald spot and thought "OH MY GOD MY HAIRLINE IS RECEDING"
...Then I discovered it has always been like that but I never noticed because my hair is usually very thick at the front and I naturally would never notice it.
